enable_ai_analysis.description: Enables the AI Technical Analysis section on the report page.

enable_comparison_feature.description: Allows users to add pumps to a shortlist and compare them.

use_advanced_bep_migration.description: Uses the Hydraulic Institute model for BEP shift calculations. Disable for legacy affinity laws.

enable_bep_proximity_search.description: Shows the 'BEP Proximity Search' tab on the main selection page.

enable_ai_chatbot.description: Enables the AI chatbot feature for pump selection assistance.

enable_performance_testing.description: Enables the Performance Testing feature in the Tools menu.

enable_direct_search.description: Shows the Direct Search tab on the main selection page.

enable_admin_features.description: Enables administrative features and configuration management.

enable_brain_monitoring.description: Enables Brain system monitoring and diagnostics interface.

enable_pdf_reports.description: Enables PDF report generation for pump selections.
